dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.cust.CustomerAccount
dataStructure.description:
An arrangement that a customer has with an enterprise that provides products to the customer.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerAccount

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: name
child.description:
The name of the account.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: accountType
child.description:
A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: accountType

child.name: accountStatus
child.description:
The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: accountStatus

child.name: pin
child.description:
A multidigit personal identification numbe that is used by a Customer to gain access to a CustomerAccount at an ATM, a computer, or a telephone system, and so forth.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: pin

child.name: creditLimit
child.description:
The maximum amount of money that may be charged on a account.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: creditLimit
